translation: Byyhi yylhi drya yin zvrh pknavnh.
Tamy saʿth zanhi prth aakhah brvntth kya svuzun pth kya trvvun.
Ae ansanh kmụ̄ chyzn hsrvvukh czh pnnis krym prvrdigar snz nafrmạny krns petth.
Yymụ̄ prvrdigarn czh pạdh kvrnkh byyhi syvd kvrnkh tvpth brabr th mʿtdl kvrnuk.
Yth shklhi mnz yvczuhn tth shklhi mnz diczne cze trkyb.
Kunhi chyzn hsrvvukh nh blkh chhe ḥqyqt kh tvhụ̄ chhiv aapuz gnzran ʿmlhi hndis jzahs yʿny qyamt ks dvhas, (rvuzitv tvhụ̄ athụ̄ khyals sintụ̄)
Mgr aashi chhi tohyhi petth mqrr krimtụ̄ rạchh.
Time chhi khdays nishhi mʿtbr lykhn vạlụ̄.
Timn chhu mʿlvm spdan thi svrue yhi tvhụ̄ kran chhiv nyk v bd.
Pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ nykv kar āsn jntn mnz nʿmtn andr.
Pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ bdkar th nafrman āsn jhnms mnz ʿdhabs andr.
Aczn tth jhnms mnz qyamt kh doh.
Byyhi chhinh tim tamhi jhnm nishhi alg th khttith rvzvunụ̄.
Kus chyz tary cze fkri ae ansanh suh jzahuk doh kvtah mshkl chhu?
Byyhi chhuse vnan kus chyz zanhi ravy cze jzahuk doh kvtah mshkl th skht chhu? (mkhtṣr bvz)
Suh gvv sue doh yymhi doh nh kanhh aakhah kạnshi akis nfʿ hykhi vatnạvith pnnhi akhtyar, ḥkm th akhtyar āshi tamhi doh kunis khdays byyhi nh kạnshi.
